channel.title: Devolution(ballscape) Time back bug
channel.description: So i started my server wich devolution(ballscape) source&Client but..... here i find are time back bug. Then u close server same time all charachters getting time back to last srv restart. so i wana ask how to add outo charchter saver. i wana outomatically svae all charchter about every 10 mins..... maby samone know how to do what?
